import Header from "../components/header" import GetOnePokemonInWeb from "../components/getOnePokemonInWeb" import SavePokemonInDatabase from "../components/savePokemonInDatabase" import styles from './styles.css' import { useState } from "react" const Dashboard = () => { const [showSave,setShowSave] = useState(false); const [showSearch,setShowSearch] = useState(false) const handlerSearch = () => { setShowSearch(true); return } return (
{showSearch?
:null}
{showSave?
:null}
) } export default Dashboard
